page.title: 02FARMING 1
page.content: Dairy farming is very important in our area . {Hoe farm }is a dairy farm and it belongs to {Broadlands .}It would cost Â£40,000 to replace or to build a new one . They can only milk ten cows at a time . {Hoe farm }has 100 chick- ens . They have 123 cows . The milking machines are 16 years old . They have two bulls and they buy cows in the summer. There are five dairy farms and 700 cows on the{Broadlands Estate.}All the cows sre{Fresians.}There is no poultry at{Upper Ashfield Farm.}A good cow produces about 18 litres a day. Each cow gives birth to one calf a year. The cows reach about 12 years of age depending on whether they get slaughtered. Each farm is about 200 acres except{Hoe Farm}which is 140 acres.
